# Apicompat Docs

> Documentation for Apicompat Docs.

*Topics available: 8*

- [Assembly validation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/assembly-validation.md): Learn how assembly validation can be used to develop consistent and well-formed multi-targeting assemblies.
- [Package Validation Diagnostics IDs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/diagnostic-ids.md): A reference for assembly and package validation diagnostic IDs, and how to suppress them.
- [Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Tool global tool](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/global-tool.md): Learn about the Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Tool global tool, which performs API compatibility checks on assemblies and packages.
- [API compatibility tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/overview.md): Learn how .NET compatibility features, including MSBuild tasks and a command-line tool, can be used to develop consistent and well-formed multi-targeting libraries.

## Subtopics

- [Package Validation Docs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/fundamentals/apicompat/package-validation/llms.txt): Topics available: 4; Package Validation Docs documentation and reference.
